description: Extract comprehensive chapter information from documents including hierarchy, summaries, and metadata.

fieldSchema.name: DocumentWithChapters
fieldSchema.description: Document structure with chapters, sections, and metadata.

document_title.description: The title of the entire document

document_summary.description: A brief summary of the entire document's content and purpose

chapters.description: List of all chapters, sections, and major headings in the document

items.description: Information about a single chapter or section

title.description: The exact chapter or section title

level.description: Hierarchy level - '1' for main chapters, '2' for subsections, '3' for sub-subsections, etc.

summary.description: A concise 2-3 sentence summary of this chapter's content and key points

key_topics.description: Comma-separated list of 3-5 main topics, themes, or concepts covered in this chapter

page_range.description: Page range for this chapter in format 'start-end' (e.g., '5-12')
